basic.origin: South Western Asia, South Eastern Europe
basic.blooming: Flowering period April, fruiting period September-October

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, may grow in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Pruning accordingly for any favorate tree shapes
